languages.text:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
-<indent=5%>The allies' next attack always succeeds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The next attack against these allies misses.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The allies' critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Теобальд предсказывает будущее и дает 2 случайным союзникам преимущество в бою:
-<indent=5%>Их следующая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} всегда достигает цели.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Следующая атака против них всегда промахивается.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Их шанс критического попадания возрастает.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
- the allies' next attack always succeeds
- the next attack against these allies misses
- the allies' critical hit chance is increased

Theobald sieht die Zukunft voraus und gewährt zwei zufälligen Verbündeten mehrere Vorteile gegenüber ihren Feinden:
-<indent=5%>der nächste Angriff der Verbündeten ist immer erfolgreich.</indent>
-<indent=5%>der nächste Angriff gegen diese Verbündeten misslingt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>die kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} der Verbündeten wird erhöht.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
-<indent=5%>The allies' next attack always succeeds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The next attack against these allies misses.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The allies' critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Theobald sieht die Zukunft voraus und gewährt zwei zufälligen Verbündeten mehrere Vorteile gegenüber ihren Feinden:
- der nächste Angriff der Verbündeten ist immer erfolgreich
- der nächste Angriff gegen diese Verbündeten geht daneben
- die kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} der Verbündeten wird erhöht

languages.text:
Théobald prévoit l'avenir et accorde à deux alliés aléatoires plusieurs avantages sur leurs ennemis :
-<indent=5%>l'attaque suivante des alliés réussit systématiquement</indent>
-<indent=5%>l'attaque suivante contre ces alliés échoue</indent>
-<indent=5%>les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup critique{/g} des alliés augmentent</indent>
languages.original_text:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
-<indent=5%>The allies' next attack always succeeds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The next attack against these allies misses.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The allies' critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Theobald prévoit l'avenir et accorde à deux alliés aléatoires plusieurs avantages sur leurs ennemis :
- l'attaque suivante des alliés réussit systématiquement
- l'attaque suivante contre ces alliés échoue
- les chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}infliger un coup{/g} critique des alliés augmentent

languages.text:
西奥巴德预知未来，给予两名随机盟友以下增益效果：
- <indent=5%>该盟友下次攻击必定命中敌人。</indent>
- <indent=5%>针对该盟友的下次攻击必定失手。</indent>
- <indent=5%>该盟友{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
-<indent=5%>The allies' next attack always succeeds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The next attack against these allies misses.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The allies' critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

- 针对该盟友的下次攻击必定失手。
- 该盟友暴击率提高。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g}

languages.text:
Theobald predice el futuro y proporciona varias ventajas a dos aliados aleatorios:
-<indent=5%>Su próximo ataque siempre impacta.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El próximo ataque que reciban siempre falla.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Su {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico aumenta.</indent>

languages.text:
テオバルドは未来を予知し、ランダムな味方2人を敵より有利な状態にする。
-<indent=5%>味方の次の攻撃は必ず成功する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>これら味方に対する次の攻撃は失敗する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>味方のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g}が上昇する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Theobald foresees the future and grants two random allies several advantages over their enemies:
-<indent=5%>The allies' next attack always succeeds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The next attack against these allies misses.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The allies' critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
テオバルドは未来を予知し、ランダムな味方2人を敵より有利な状態にする。
－味方の次の攻撃は必ず成功する
－これら味方に対する次の攻撃は失敗する
－味方のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が上昇する

languages.text:
Theobald, geleceği öngörür ve iki rastgele dost birime düşmanlarına karşı çeşitli avantajlar sağlar:
-<indent=5%>Dost birimlerin bir sonraki saldırısı her zaman başarılı olur.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bu dost birimlere karşı bir sonraki saldırı ıskalar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dost birimlerin kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} artar.</indent>
